plafar.logic

Class ShopServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • plafar.logic.ShopServices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    plafar.logic.abstractions.ShopingServices

    public class ShopServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements plafar.logic.abstractions.ShopingServices
    ShopServices is a implementation of ShopingServices using the services architecture for the store.
